queryParameters.name: search
queryParameters.description: Search users by username or email.

queryParameters.name: sortBy
queryParameters.description: Sort users by a specific attribute (e.g., 'createdAt', 'username').

queryParameters.name: order
queryParameters.description: Order of sorting: ascending ('asc') or descending ('desc').

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Limit the number of users returned.

statusCodes.description: Bad request. Missing or invalid parameters.
Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

attributes.name: publicId
attributes.description: A unique public identifier for the user.

attributes.name: createdAt
attributes.description: The date and time when the user was created.
